name: Comet Hop
description:
You're a little comet creature, hopping from comet to comet. Get to the purple ice rifts at the end of each level to win!

Press W, A, S, or D to hop in that direction. Hold the key down to charge up, and jump farther!

Made for Possum House Game's Chill Jam. My themes were "chill" and "space."
